a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Income share of the richest 1% (before tax), 1820 to 2022
The share of income received by the richest 1% of the population. Income here is measured before taxes and
benefits. The dotted lines represent extrapolations due to limited data availability.
Note: Income is measured before payment of taxes and non-pension benefits, but after the payment of public and private pensions.
